title: Sophisticated New Jersey Mansion Retreat 40 Minutes from Newark with Onsite Dining & Luxurious Spa
description:
Roll back the years with a stay at this elegant mansion, cocooned amid 400 acres of lush gardens and meandering streams in New Jersey's quaint Somerset County. Quiet and secluded, bask in the romantic allure of the property, located only a 40-minute drive from bustling Newark, and take this opportunity to rejuventate in the lap of nature.

Feel the sundry details of life disappear as you feast on farm-to-table delicacies at the hotel's signature restaurant, The Mansion Tavern, sip on well-crafted cocktails in the cosy The Great Room and indulge in restorative massages at the world-class Spa Pendry. For wine connoisseurs, a fine dining experience at Ninety Acres, featuring seasonally inspired menus, should be on the bucket list.
offer_address: 400 Natirar Drive, Peapack and Gladstone, New Jersey, 07977, USA
